title: Choose You Again
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You and your broken nose and dirty language
You can't pick up your clothes, emotional baggage
I wouldn't change a thing, no, no, no
I wouldn't change a thing
You, you love a good fight just like a child
You can't make up your mind, you love denial
I wouldn't change a thing, no, no, no
I wouldn't change a thing
[Pre-Chorus]
I know we're nowhere close to a fantasy
(Ah, ah, ah, oh yeah)
I'm in love with the reality
(Ah, ah, ah, oh yeah)
[Chorus]
Even if i had a choice, I'd choose you again
Pick you out from all the noise, I'd choose you again
Even if we're burn it down, I know that you'll stay around
Even if I had a choice
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey, ey, ey
[Verse 2]
You been hitting the snooze when I'm sleeping silently
You got stupid tattoos, 
"Carpe diem, baby"
I wouldn't change a thing, no, no, no
I wouldn't change a thing

[Pre-Chorus]
I know we're nowhere close to a fantasy
(Ah, ah, ah, oh yeah)
I'm in love with the reality
(Ah, ah, ah, oh yeah)
[Chorus]
Even if i had a choice, I'd choose you again
Pick you out from all the noise, I'd choose you again
Even if we're burn it down, I know that you'll stay around
Even if I had a choice
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey, ey, ey
Even if we burn it down, I know that you'll stay around
Even if I had a choice
I'd choose you, I'd choose you
[Bridge]
I wouldn't change a thing, no, no, no
I wouldn't change a thing
You got this sin that gets under my skin
And you know I wouldn't change a thing, yeah
[Chorus]
Even if i had a choice, I'd choose you again
Pick you out from all the noise, I'd choose you again
Even if we're burn it down, I know that you'll stay around
Even if I had a choice
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey
I'd choose you, I'd choose you again, ey, ey, ey (choose, choose)
Even if we burn it down, I know that you'll stay around
Even if I had a choice
I'd choose you, I'd choose you
